reviews.review_msg: Dr. Winter changed my life. I had almost given up on my dream profession and she got me to believe in myself. She is smart, and an amazing mentor.

Not an easy mark. Take this is you are interested in museum work or curating. Dr. Winter does not coddle you, she makes you work hard. She guides you without giving you instructions, meaning you need to make mistakes and learn. Problem: team oriented, avoid lazy classmates.  Benefit: touch artifacts + learn so much more than a lecture setting.
